title: 5326 S. Harper in Hyde Park: 2Bed-Heat,New Kitch,SS Appl,DW,MW,HDWD
posting_body: ['Two Bedroom-One Bath at 5326 S. Harper with stainless steel appliances, granite tops, dishwasher, built-in microwave, brand new aluminum windows, hardwood floors and Sunroom.', 'Also has a deck area.', 'Closet space is plentiful and includes some built in shelving.', 'A coinless laundry room is on site, which you do not have to go outside to access, and there is a rear yard for relaxing outside.', 'WIFI, heat, water and cooking gas are all FREE!', 'Finally, there is a nice, well lit and newly painted bike room for your convenience.', '5326 S. Harper might just be the best location in Hyde Park.', 'The University of Chicago is only a few blocks away as are the lakefront, public tennis courts, and Museum of Science and Industry.', "Additionally, you are just 1/2 block south of Hyde Park's newly redeveloped 53rd St. retail corridor (including Harper Court), and 2 1/2 blocks to the new Whole Foods!", 'Metra rail service is provided is within 1 1/2 blocks making access to the Loop and Millennium Park easy and affordable.', 'The Walk Score at this address is 92 (a "walker\'s paradise"), and the Bike Score a near perfect 96 (a "biker\'s paradise")!', 'Apartment Available on 9/1/22', 'Call Eric at 773-593-1147  to schedule a viewing.', 'For information on similar properties, please visit our website at <URL>', '**Pictures are representative**', 'LEASE TERMS:', '$400 Move-in fee', '$75 Application fee per applicant and co-signer if required', '$100 Cat fee per cat', '$250 Dog Move-In Fee', '$35 Monthly Pet Rent', 'Limit: 1 Dog up to 35 lbs.', '(Non-Aggressive Breed)', 'Property Managed By:', 'Realty & Mortgage Co.', '1509 W. Berwyn Ave., Suite #200', 'Chicago, IL 60640', 'PH: 773-989-8000', 'FAX: 773-989-6979', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
